title: Insidious Chapter 2 Extended Behind the Scenes Featurette
description: This is an extended behind the scenes featurette video of "Insidious: Chapter 2" and includes four movie clips, b-roll footage of props, sets, scenes and interviews of director James Wa, writer Leigh Whannell, Patrick Wilson and Rose Byrne. WARNING: May Contain Spoilers. 31 NIGHTS OF MODERN HALLOWEEN HORROR CLASSICS Episode 1: http://youtu.be/RUhRLvnNwlw Episode 2: http://youtu.be/oM2moufMMgI Episode 3: http://youtu.be/LGP_ra3QoTU There is more information about this video below but first a few Snouty Pig recommended videos: RIddick Behind the Scenes: http://youtu.be/Ep2rl5Ih7IM Evil Dead (2013) Behind the Scenes http://youtu.be/kBuzPjk7Tec Pacific Rim Piggies: http://youtu.be/d86D7pX_HBs Cloud Atlas Behind the Scenes http://youtu.be/o75FEJUXVtA Film Synopsis: A day after the events that happened in the first film, the Lambert family are happily reunited after Josh (Patrick Wilson) was able to get Dalton (Ty Simpkins) back from The Further. Soon, however, Renai (Rose Byrne) notices that paranormal events resume as the family suspects something dark and evil may have come back with Josh. For more information visit these links: https://www.facebook.com/InsidiousMovie http://www.insidiousch2.com If you liked our video consider subscribing or visiting our website: http://www.snoutypig.com/ Or follow our Twitter Pig: @thesnoutypig https://twitter.com/thesnoutypig Like Us On Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SnoutyPig
